items.title: Sales Associate, Taipei
items.content:
Sales Associate, Taipei at Faria Education Group

Taipei, Remote · Full Time
Skills
Writing, Travel, Communication Skills, Empathy, Able to Work Independently, Written communication
Compensation
$25K–$36K
No Equity
Visa Sponsorship
Available

Job Description

Description

We are looking for an energetic, persistent go-getter with significant prior sales experience.
You will have primary responsibility for outbound sales outreach for ManageBac in the EMEA region. ManageBac is the world’s leading software provider to International Baccalaureate world schools and currently serves over 2,000 schools in 120 countries.

Requirements

What are we looking for?
● Ability to manage high-stress situations and troubleshoot challenging problems.
● Exceptional written and oral communication skills.
● Ability to learn quickly & execute quickly.
● Attention-to-detail and satisfaction from a job well-done.
● Native English speaker.

What will you learn in the first 30 days?
● How ManageBac is structured to support International Baccalaureate schools.
● Our standard outbound sales procedures.
● Our internal workflows for ensuring smooth, efficient sales follow-up.

Key Responsibilities
● Conducting school visits & demonstrations with interested schools in your region, and moving them to trial.
● Qualifying new signups.
● Attending regional conferences and providing presentations.
● Working with the marketing team to follow up on recurring ManageBac marketing campaigns.

This position requires over 50% travel.

Benefits
$70,000 ~100,000 NTD/ month, negotiable and dependant on experience.
You will be eligible for a sales incentive bonus for each year based on reaching certain ARR targets.

To apply go to http://faria.co/work
Please note: Due to a high volume of applicants, only short-listed candidates will be contacted.

items.title: Partnerships Manager
items.content:
DESCRIPTION

From accountants to startup incubators, universities to innovation consultants, the range of partnerships we have at GrantTree is vast. Our useful funding products, which we believe will change the landscape of Government funding allows us to network with people at the forefront of software technology in the UK. We're excited to start our hunt for the talent who will grow and maintain our network of satisfied partners.

Are you the self-motivated, entrepreneurial Partnerships Manager we're looking for?

GrantTree was founded 7 years ago and employs 33 people. In our self-managing culture everyone has the freedom, power and trust to do great work. We call this open culture. It’s been successful for us so far, a rewarding and somewhat unusual working experience for self-motivated individuals (we suggest you check out our GlassDoor reviews). This is the ideal environment for creative, independent people who are open to developing through challenging work.

Our Sales team is...

High-reaching.
Brilliant at conversion.
Formed of talented individuals each with their own creative way of building effective relationships.

Could you see yourself in this team?

A significant amount of GrantTree's success is a direct result from collaboration with our partners. We work with fantastic organisations and it's important to us to continue to strengthen our relationships with each of our existing and newly on-boarded partners.

You will work closely with the Partnership Director as a member of the wider Sales team to implement new partnership plans and to grow the deal flow from our existing Partnership base. Drawing on your prior Business Development experience you'll capitalise on your expert relationship building techniques to thrive within the Partnership space.

REQUIREMENTS

- You have professional experience in independent lead generation (within software/tech would be a plus).
- You're confident negotiating contracts and closing new business where necessary.
- You know how to generate and manage pipelines.
- You have the ability to implement partnership delivery plans.
- You enjoy working towards targets.
- Running workshops, roundtables, existing delivery plans and attending events are key activities for you.
- You're innovative, and think creatively about how to add further value to partnerships.
- You pride yourself on your brilliant communications skills.

BENEFITS

We believe that people should be rewarded fairly for the work they do. At GrantTree there is no secrecy over salaries and the way we work them out. For this role, this is likely to lie between £28k-£35k depending on experience. We don't have a commission structure here, and ask you to consider, "is important to you?"

While we understand an environment without commission won't work for everyone, if you join our team at GrantTree you can enjoy the unlimited access to paid training we offer, access to health insurance, our cycle to work scheme, and an annual discretionary bonus which all contribute to the overall package.

Aside from money, we offer a place where you can be yourself. We want you to develop your skills and fulfil your potential. We have a flexible approach to working, and some of our staff work remotely most of the time. Our office near Old Street is bright and airy, with a fab roof terrace. You can take up to 6 weeks as holiday each year.

Equal Opportunities

Teams are stronger when they have a diverse range of people. Applications are accepted from everyone, regardless of the categories they put themselves in. We also encourage talented ‘square pegs’, who don’t neatly fit into the person specification, to apply.

How to Apply

Please use the email address provided and let us know you saw this job on "Work in Startups".

items.title: Blockchain Education Growth Manager, Strategic Initiatives Team
items.content:
Blockchain Education Growth Manager, Strategic Initiatives Team at ConsenSys

Brooklyn, Remote · Full Time
Compensation
$90K–$130K
0.01%–0.01%
Visa Sponsorship
Available

Job Description

Apply Here: https://consensys.net/open-positions/?gh_jid=730153

ConsenSys is the world’s largest blockchain venture production studio focused on developing cutting edge application across all major industry sectors, investing in disruptive startups, and consulting global organizations / governments on decentralized technologies powered by Ethereum.

Our mission is to use these solutions to power the emerging economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet. ConsenSys is building the future of identity, financial markets, commerce, security and infrastructure, and more.

About the role:

The education team at ConsenSys is growing fast within ConsenSys with the first of its kind blockchain education programs being developed and delivered globally. We are a team of ex-consultants, bankers, product managers, project managers, educators, entrepreneurs, and teachers. Given the explosive growth of blockchain technologies worldwide, the projects led by this team are strategic in nature with implications for the global blockchain ecosystem.

The team’s partners include global corporations, major governments, world class developers / lawyers / business schools and our initiatives are changing education paradigms fundamentally.

Learn more about us here:

https://consensys.net/press/
https://consensys.net
Our team's first initiative: https://medium.com/@ConsenSysAcademy

About you:

A multi-tasker who thrives in a fast-paced environment
Self-directed and motivated by leading projects end to end
An innovative problem solver who likes to get new initiatives off the ground and then see them executed flawlessly to completion
A strategic and critical thinker but with an eye to outcomes
A decision maker with the ability to generate buy-in and / or adjust conclusions rapidly based on inputs
Out of the box in solution design but methodical and structured in execution

Your Qualifications:

3-4 years of experience in finance, management consulting or building businesses
Excellent verbal and written communication skills with demonstrated experience engaging and influencing executives and entrepreneurs alike
Entrepreneurial spirit with track record for successfully delivering measurable results in fast-moving environments
You have a passion and enthusiasm for our business and the greater movement it is a part of
Great chemistry with our team and culture
Optional

MBA
Domain knowledge or prior experience in education or curriculum design
Technical understanding of blockchain
Brooklyn NY preferred, open to other remote locations

Job Description

This is a business development role working with the digital media agency & publishers industry. Meaning you need to talk great and write great, and most importantly, make agencies, media and publishers subscribe for Lobster.

Lobster is looking for a person experienced in working with (or better off within!) digital media, advertising agencies and creatives of all sorts. This is a very important role for us great dedication and a share option in the company, it is almost a co-founder role.

We have developed an outstanding tool for the agencies and publishers to find exactly right social media visual content and license it for work from the authors. Now we are turning it into the whole world’s honest place to access real people’s content and it’s your turn to come on stage and reach all the agencies that need it.

Launched on TechCrunch Disrupt Battlefield Europe 2014, Graduate of Wayra UK accelerator 2014, raised £1m in 2017, reached 10 million photos and videos immediately available with the help of AI, first great agency subscribers and brands – waiting for you to grow the UK & European customer side!

We can only consider people in London and settled in the UK to join the team at this time, even though you may be in office only occasionally.

items.title: (stealth start-up) | Business partner | Anywhere US | Part-time OK | REMOTE (US-only) | up to 50% equity
items.content:
(stealth start-up) | Business partner | Anywhere US | Part-time OK | REMOTE (US-only) | up to 50% equity

I am looking for a business co-founder with up to 50% equity for a fully automated e-commerce business based initially on drop-shipping high quality items on Amazon and other platforms. In parallel, I am building an SaaS (another company) exposing some of the functionality developed for this purpose to 3rd party sellers and would like to have this new company as a dogfooding business that is fully automated, profitable, growing and solid (100% customer and platform satisfaction), instantly putting into use latest tech I develop. I have already fully automated inventory ETL generation, automated repricing, purging stale stock, retrieving orders, placing them at suppliers and notifying customers about shipping. In addition, I am a Deep Learning expert and work on NLP and TTS tech for automating client support as well. Your role would be handling all administrative tasks, searching for new high-quality suppliers, handling Amazon issues and initially customer support until it is automated away. You need to be a US resident, ideally citizen, working from anywhere/anytime you want, usually less than 1h/day. Contact me on deepmarket@tuta.io.

items.title: BuySellAds.com: Ad Sales Operations Specialist
items.content:
Full-time

(Anywhere)

We are seeking a highly motivated individual that can work in a data-driven environment. The candidate will be an analytical problem solver, and have a high level of customer focus.

Have you ever built a bridge? Get ready to connect the ad operations, sales, and marketing teams. We need help enabling effective decision making by retrieving and aggregating data from multiple sources. Once we get the data, we’ll need help compiling it into a digestible and actionable format so that the Sales team can make informed decisions. 

Your Responsibilities: 

  • Develop strong understanding of BuySellAds media products
  • Work in partnership with the Sales team to understand client objectives and needs
  • Help take a signed IO and turn it into a live, successful campaign
  • Continually be in the know on our top buyer campaigns and analyze for opportunities for improvement alongside sales representatives
  • Assist in finding resolutions to ad serving issues and reporting discrepancies
  • Work with Ad Ops Team to monitor all live campaigns for proper serving, click through action, and conversion events
  • Assist advertisers with their reporting needs, and support the Sales Team with reporting requests
  • Obtain creative/3rd party tags and assist in delivery or creation when needed

The Ideal Candidate:

  • Is excited at the opportunity to help marketers achieve complex goals
  • Has experience in the advertising industry
  • Is obsessive about web tech
  • Obsessively checks emails and replies at an alarming rate
  • Is organized and structured but is not fazed by an out of the box request
  • Has the ability to work independently, consistently producing meaningful results
  • Is comfortable working remotely
  • Ability to adapt in a fast-changing environment
  • Strong analytical and problem solving skills
  • Ability to prioritize tasks with a proactive "can-do" attitude
  • Client-focused mindset with a passion for using data and analytics to drive business results
  • Familiarity with different online advertising pricing structures (CPC, CPM, CPA, etc.)
  • Understanding of third-party advertising tags and reporting
  • Bonus points for past marketing analyst or sales operation experience

About Us:

BuySellAds transformed the way advertising was transacted online with the introduction of its Marketplace in 2008. BuySellAds’ advertising technology platform provides advertisers with direct access to the industry’s top performing display, native, dedicated email, and sponsored content inventory. Our platform empowers both advertisers and publishers by bridging the ad tech divide. Today, we work with more than 12,000 advertisers and help them connect with the internet’s most passionate audiences. We are a remote company that primarily works around an EST schedule.

To apply email salesopsQ12018@buysellads.com with your resume and why you would be a good fit. 

 

Apply:

items.title: Sales Development Representative
items.content:
About TINT:
TINT’s vision is to help brands humanize their marketing across their customer journey. Why? Because traditional brand marketing is not working effectively anymore. Consumers are constantly bombarded with unengaging and irrelevant ads on the daily, leading to ads being blocked and trust diminishing.

To solve this, our belief is that a brand’s customers are often its best marketers, and the explosion of social media sharing on smartphones has substantially scaled word of mouth marketing for organizations.

TINT’s software platform empowers B2C marketers to find, curate, and display their most effective customer-generated content from social media onto their websites, digital screens, emails, social ads, and jumbotrons. That way they can increase engagement and trust with consumers, which leads to increasing marketing performance and decreasing content creation costs.

Our company is a 4.5 year, profitable, bootstrapped startup with 30 team members headquartered in San Francisco with a distributed team across the globe (US, London, Dubai, India, Canada, Brazil). Our team has overcome many odds, including achieving profitability within 5 months of launch, growing to $1m ARR within 1 year, scaling to over $6m in revenue/year without VC funding, and served over 5000+ clients across 172 countries.

Many of our employees joined and continually grow with TINT due to our radically transparent and fair culture. We believe that everyone at TINT deserves the opportunity to reach their potential, and TINT is a perfect vehicle to do so. Our cultural values and learnings prove so.

Opportunity:
Having achieved what we have with bootstrapped constraints and inbound tactics, we are seeking an experienced sales development representative to join our EU team.

Our perfect colleague is entrepreneurial, organized, high-energy and has strong interpersonal communication skills. You have a passion for sales and the ability to create meaningful relationships with senior decision makers. You have 2 years experience working in SaaS Enterprise Sales. Bonus points for previous work experience in marketing technology. We are looking for someone who knows how to manage their time and has top class communication skills. It’s critical that you are able to learn quickly when using new tools.

This is an ideal position for an entrepreneurial sales development agent with experience in software/marketing looking to advance quickly within a global SaaS team.


Responsibilities:

- Generating qualified demos and outbound opportunities by phone and email
- Build and execute strategy to penetrate FTSE 350+ accounts
- Working with our account executives to prospect intros and close large enterprise deals
- Reporting on our prospecting performance and identifying potential optimizations
- Updating and leveraging CRM to better track our business

Qualifications:

- Experience and familiarity with sales automation software
- Background in full lifecycle of enterprise technology sales
- Bachelor’s degree (B.A.) or at least 2 years of relevant work experience.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills (English as first language).
- Proven ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic and goal-oriented environment.
- Maintain a high sense of urgency and entrepreneurial work ethic that is required to drive business outcomes, with exceptional attention to detail.
- Experience with Salesforce preferred.
- Positive “can do” attitude, passionate and able to show commitment and to inspire others.
- Ability to set and manage multiple priorities.


Benefits:

- The Base Salary range is $25-33k GDP -- $34-46k USD - depending on experience. The compensation table for On Target Earnings (OTE) is currently being finalized and is estimated to be around $48-55k GDP -- $65-75k USD. Please note that this is an estimate and OTE is not final.
- It is expected that top performers will progress into full Account Executives role.
- Personal Development Stipend - A monthly stipend designed for self-improvement. Whether it's books, yoga classes, or a fitness tracker, we want our teammates to improve themselves.
- Team Transparency - We calculate compensation based on a formula that we all agree on. Cap table is made available to all employees. Business financials are known by all teammates.
- You will play a critical role in determining the company's success. We want someone who brings a strong opinion to the table and challenges us to perform to the highest standards.
- Equity
- Flexible vacation policy with recommended 1 week off per quarter.
- Flexible remote work policy
- Monthly philanthropy opportunities
- Annual company retreats
- Your own MacBook laptop

items.title: Sales Manager
items.content:
*WHO ARE WE?*
We are NETZ, a FinTech business currently disrupting the market with our high-tech prospecting and client intelligence engine.

We work with leading wealth managers, VCs, and crowd-funding platforms, supporting their investor engagement. Through our data-led AI technology, we help our clients source and engage with high-quality prospects such as for example HNWs, angel investors, or exited entrepreneurs. Within twelve months of launching, we have become profitable and are now looking to grow our team. We are based in London, but the candidate can work remotely.

*WHAT’S THE JOB DESCRIPTION?*
We’re looking for a results-driven sales manager for 1-2 days/week to actively seek out and engage customer prospects. You will provide complete and appropriate solutions for every customer in order to boost top-line revenue growth, customer acquisition levels and profitability.

Let's break the role down for you:
* Present, promote and sell our services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers
* Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their needs
* Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
* Reach out to customer leads through cold calling
* Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction
* Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
* Coordinate sales effort with team members
* Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.
* Keep abreast of best practices and promotional trends
* Continuously improve through feedback

*ABOUT YOU?*
* Proven work experience in sales and business development
* Excellent knowledge of MS Office
* Familiarity with CRM practices along with ability to build productive business professional relationships
* Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
* Excellent selling, communication and negotiation skills
* Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills
* Ability to create and deliver presentations tailored to the audience needs
* Relationship management skills and openness to feedback
* BS/BA degree or equivalent

*WHAT ARE WE OFFERING?*
* Part-time role in London, remote is possible
* 20% commission + equity in the company
* Steep learning curve for building your career in FinTech and business development
* You will be working with an experienced team with passion, energy, drive
* You will get responsibility very early on

If you are interested in joining our fast-growing company, apply right now. Please send your CV and 3-4 lines on why you are the right candidate

items.title: Sylvie McCracken- Ebook Engines: Enrollment Coach/ Sales Position
items.content:
Enrollment Coach/ Sales Position

Posted Jan 9

Sylvie McCracken- Ebook Engines
Headquarters: Oregon
https://sylviemccracken.com

My team and I are looking to add 2 sales professionals to work as part our enrollment team for our group coaching program where we help doctors and other health professionals create 6 figure passive income streams with ebooks.

We've built an "evergreen" funnel that consistently produces 4-5 pre-qualified, pre-scheduled calls per day per rep.

Would you like to:

  • Earn $700 or MORE per enrollment? Be handed at least FIVE red-hot, pre-sold inbound leads EVERY DAY to talk to, with ZERO cold calling?
  • Be on the phone with prospects that have already SAID YES 10 times BEFORE they even get on the phone with you? 
  • Would you like to make an incredible DIFFERENCE in the lives of clients?

We provide our sales enrollment team:

  • AMAZING pre-sold leads Surgeon income from home
  • A Fun and Flexible working environment A World Class Program to sell
  • Sales training with a legendary sales trainer The ability to change lives
  • **A PROVEN, Predictable Sales Enrollment System

This position is for ambitious, hardworking salespeople that want to make lucrative commissions while making a massive difference in the world.

NOTE: This is NOT for everyone!

You MUST have total integrity including turning away a client (forgoing the sale/commission) if they’re not a good fit for our program.
You MUST be willing to work the Enrollment System we provide you.
You MUST be coachable/ open to feedback.
You MUST be willing to provide references.
You MUST have consistent access to reliable internet (we are a 100% remote team).
You like speaking on the phone and via zoom

If you meet ALL of the above criteria, let’s talk!

Apply for this position

If you’re interested, please complete the following 2- step process to begin (please do NOT PM me):1- Complete this application: http://sylviemccracken.pages.ontraport.net/Enrollment-Coach2- Take this quick assessment- tonyrobbins.com/disc - email us the results to support@sylviemccracken.com 3- Create a quick (under 3 min) video on WHY you are the perfect person for this role, and send to us at support@sylviemccracken.com(you can upload to YouTube or similar as unlisted and send me the link)We'll contact you if you’ve been selected to move to the next step.Feel free to tag or share with someone you think would be a great fit!Thank you!Sylvie McCrackenFounder & CEO of Ebook Engines

items.title: Enterprise Sales - UK
items.content:
Enterprise Sales - UK at Talmundo

London, London, Remote · Full Time
Skills
Communication Skills, Enterprise Sales, Native English Speaker, Fluent in English, Proactive attitude
Compensation
£45K–£55K
No Equity
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

Job Description

As an Onboarding Solutions Consultant you’ll be responsible for driving sales of Talmundo products within Enterprise prospects located in The UK exceeding sales objectives. You will manage all aspects of the sales process including lead management, qualification, evaluation, close and support the customer success department when needed. This role is a quota-carrying sales position that plays an integral role in the success of the overall sales team.

The benefits of joining our team:

• Location: London, working remotely. With frequent visits to our main offices in Antwerp office and/or The Hague, which are both centrally located near the central train stations.
• Flexibility: We value balance and time with your family (however you define it). You can combine working from home, at our offices and working from client offices. We don’t focus on the number of hours but believe in trust and results.
• Opportunity: You'll work for one the most exciting start-ups in the Benelux region, now employing 20 people and working with some of the biggest brands and companies like Bacardi, Deloitte, ArcelorMittal, BNP, etc.
• Team: Join a young, dynamic and fast growing international team.
• Offer: We offer a competitive package with both short and long term incentives.

Some of the things you’ll be doing include:
• Define and execute territory / account sales plans for assigned geographic territory and then meet and exceed sales goals (quotas) through prospecting, qualifying, managing and closing sales opportunities.
• Develop and manage sales pipeline, prospect and assess sales and move a large number of transactions simultaneously through the sales pipeline.
• Manage and track customer and transactional information in a CRM system.
• Coordinate resources throughout the sales cycle, including product support and sales engineering.
• Provide product demonstrations and general support to prospective customers.
• Provide regular reporting of pipeline and forecast through the CRM system.
• Keep abreast of competition, competitive issues and products.
• Practice effective, excellent communication with management, prospects and support staff.
• Participate in team building and company-growth activities including strategy setting, sales training, marketing efforts and customer care.
• Travel to customer locations.
• Other duties as assigned.

Who you are:
• Experienced. 2 – 5 years of enterprise software sales experience.
• Multilingual. English native. Other languages will be a plus.
• Domain. Affinity with HR software solutions is preferred although not a must.
• Performer. Consistent overachievement of sales goals in a defined geographic territory.
• Eager to learn. You have a desire, even an obsession, to keep learning and develop new skills.
• Proactive. You don’t wait for things to happen, you make then happen.
• Consultant. Ability to quickly build trust with prospects using consultative selling approach.
• Challenger. Able to question current scenarios with facts and figures.
• Team player. Able to work independently but perfectly integrated into a team.
• Excellent Communication. You know what to say and more importantly, how to say it.
• Go-Getter. Willing to go the extra mile with a strong work ethic; self-directed and resourceful.

Does this sound like a role for you? Send us your CV to jobs@talmundo.com.

Team player

Sense of humor.

Solid base + commission

How to apply:
Please contact me directly at tom@realtimeboard.com including either a resume or a link to your LinkedIn profile.

items.title: Business Development (Full Time, Remote)
items.content:
This is a remote position.

Summary

We are looking for a motivated and high-achieving individual based in Europe to join the team working on expansion of the company in global markets. This is a full time placement with significant opportunities for growth, travel and advancement as one of the first employees of the company.

The Company

causaLens is high-tech startup based in London. We are bringing machine learning and big data technologies to the World’s leading asset managers. We are an extraordinary team and the founders have worked for some of the most prominent global hedge funds and scientific institutions.

Core requirements

* Highly capable, self-motivated, collaborative and personable
* Strong academic record
* Strong commercial skills gained from a professional background
* Interest in advanced technologies such as machine learning
* Able to demonstrate integrity, drive and natural curiosity
* An excellent written and verbal communicator with a high level of business acumen
* Ability to effectively work remotely (from home or coworking space)

Roles and Responsibilities

The role is varied and involves a combination of strategic & critical thinking, analysis and engagement with internal and external stakeholders.
* You will identify new opportunities and manage the full sales cycle from finding new prospects through to closure.
* You will be developing and maintaining value-based relationships with our customers.
* You will work directly with the CEO on developing and evaluating new opportunities.

Benefits

Successful candidate will have the opportunity to join a fast-growing, agile, and international team passionate about innovation and making a difference. We will offer guidance, mentorship, and opportunities for professional development.

Blacksmith is hiring for a remote sales position.

Big clients – We have worked with clients such as Google & GE.

Job offer in 24-48 hours – for the right candidate

Sales Award certificates
Guaranteed interview if you send documentation to info@blacksmith.agency following your application.
Why this position will change your life:

We would argue that this position is the most important position we will ever have. If you are looking to catapult your sales career, this is the place.
You will work directly with the owner of the company to drive sales qualified leads into the pipeline for the organization.
Our sales process is fine tuned and simply needs some raw sales talent to pull the lever.
The company owner & developer’s supporting families will be counting on you.

Hunter mentality

Competitive nature
Goal oriented
Internally optimistic

Nice to Have:
Experience selling digital or website knowledge
College Degree
Family oriented
Experience with 1-3 month sales cycle

items.title: Senior Account Strategist
items.content:
Senior Account Strategist - Jobmote

Senior Account Strategist

Yoko Co

Yoko Co is looking for an Senior Account Strategist - Someone to collaborate closely with clients and team members in the development and execution of a web presence strategy (mostly website design and development projects) that delivers tangible results.

In this role, you will work closely with clients who actually make a difference in the world, and it's our goal for you to have work that you thoroughly enjoy (most of the time), that challenges you to grow (much of the time), and which ultimately makes you proud (all of the time).

This position isn't for everyone. In fact, it's not for most people. It requires a combination of experience, knowledge, interpersonal skills, and creative problem solving that is found in less than 2.8% of the population.

If you think you've got what it takes, read on.

As an ideal candidate, you should:

  • Be comfortable working directly with clients, managing expectations, and explaining complex issues at whatever level of technical understanding they may have and championing their mission and passion for our team.
  • Be able to manage and maintain client relationships, coordinating with the team to ensure efforts are aligned with their objectives, and that calls and meetings are an upbeat and positive experience.
  • Understand the principles of marketing that gets results. This includes understanding the buyers journey, conversion orientation, calls to action, landing pages, autoresponders, drip email campaigns, squeeze pages, redemption pages and more.
  • Understand content marketing, search engine optimization, conversion rate optimization, marketing automation, and the slew of related and affiliated elements that affect these practices. (Experience with platforms like WordPress, Hubspot, Mailchimp, Google Analytics, etc. is great.)
  • Be well versed in traditional marketing communications skills including but not limited to copywriting, blogging, public relations, basic graphic design, web design best practices,
  • Understand the role these elements – and the website as a whole – relate to each client's organizational objectives and goals.
  • Follow a well-documented process and contribute to our agency's growth by updating it to make it more effective.
  • Be able to manage an internal team, collaborating and dictating strategy and aiding with tactical execution.
  • Be able to wear many hats, and change them quickly. In a single day, you may lead a client call to create strategy, sketch out a landing page, draft emails to clients, collaborate on a home page design, provide feedback on a client video or animation, collaborate with your team to draft new content and CTA ideas for approval, present a proposal, and then grab lunch.
  • Ideally have experience working in a similar position in an ad agency or web design firm. Alternatively have experience serving in a similar capacity virtually or on your own as an entrepreneur or contractor.
  • Be self-motivated and take initiative. If you're the kind of person who waits for someone to tell you what to do, this isn't your kind of place.
  • Be a problem solver, both collaboratively and on your own. Your Google-fu must be strong.
  • Be well-spoken and be able to take command of a room, call, or conversation.
  • Have a map to the fabled, but likely cursed, Montezuma’s Treasure.
  • Have a "can-do attitude" and be willing to jump in and try something new to expand your skills and contribute to our greater good.
  • Be willing to give and receive feedback responsibly, have the perspective to evaluate it, and the flexibility to make adjustments.
  • Be an avid learner. Half the fun of this job is learning what goes on behind the scenes in new client industries and keeping up with a constantly shifting market and our own quick paced rapidly evolving industry. You should be excited to share knowledge by educating and receiving education from others both team members and clients.
  • Be passionate about your work. As an agency we know the impact we have on the world is through the way we amplify our clients' impact. For that reason we work only with people with whom we're well aligned. That goes for clients and employees.

In this role, you'll be encouraged to contribute to and shape a company as it grows in a way you'd never have the opportunity to within a larger firm.

Still intrigued?

Good! In exchange for these skills you'll be rewarded with a very flexible work schedule, medical benefits, the option to telecommute as you'd like, great pay, unlimited leave, as well as participation in our annual shutdown (two, sometimes more, weeks off at the end of the year) and most federal holidays. Perhaps more importantly you'll find yourself immersed in work that actually matters.

P.S. - It's worth mentioning that if you join us, you'll participate in our pursuit to positively impact the lives of 100,000,000 people by the end of 2020. It's no small task, but we're already at over 27,000,000 and with someone like you on the team? Our odds just got better.

items.title: Yoko Co: Senior Account Strategist
items.content:
Senior Account Strategist

Posted Dec 7

Yoko Co
Headquarters: McLean, VA
https://www.yokoco.com/

Yoko Co is looking for an Senior Account Strategist - Someone to collaborate closely with clients and team members in the development and execution of a web presence strategy (mostly website design and development projects) that delivers tangible results.

Half the fun of this job is learning what goes on behind the scenes in new client industries and keeping up with a constantly shifting market and our own quick paced rapidly evolving industry. You should be excited to share knowledge by educating and receiving education from others both team members and clients.

In this role, you'll be encouraged to contribute to and shape a company as it grows in a way you'd never have the opportunity to within a larger firm.

Still intrigued?

Good! In exchange for these skills you'll be rewarded with a very flexible work schedule, medical benefits, the option to telecommute as you'd like, great pay, unlimited leave, as well as participation in our annual shutdown (two, sometimes more, weeks off at the end of the year) and most federal holidays. Perhaps more importantly you'll find yourself immersed in work that actually matters.

P.S. - It's worth mentioning that if you join us, you'll participate in our pursuit to positively impact the lives of 100,000,000 people by the end of 2020. It's no small task, but we're already at over 27,000,000 and with someone like you on the team? Our odds just got better.

Apply for this position

To apply, please email careers@yokoco.com. Use the subject line "I've got strategy to spare" and in your email share your strategy to earn this gig. What's your plan?

Job Description

Dataiku is looking for an experienced Account Executive to join our sales team in the San Francisco Bay Area. Since the launch of our company in the US, we have experienced healthy growth and steady market demand. This individual contributor position is a new position due to business expansion, with responsibility for an extensive west territory.
We’re looking for someone who can express passion about the new technologies and possibilities of Big Data and Advanced Analytics.
The role consists of engaging prospects and customers on the topics of their Big Data and Advanced Analytics initiatives and to help them develop a more efficient approach, leveraging our platform. The Sales Executive is responsible for the entire sales cycle, while being able to leverage various company resources, to reach a successful collaboration with the prospect.
Dataiku is a young company with great momentum and at this early stage, the Account Executive is likely to work cross functionally with Marketing, Product Management and Engineering.

Required Skills
5+ years experience in software field sales
Strong belief in a customer centric selling philosophy and applying a consultative approach in customer interactions
Background in selling innovation and new concepts to large Enterprises
Strong ability to develop a vision match with prospects and customers, to develop alignment across different groups and cultivate champions.
Good articulation of competitive positioning
Travel 30 to 50%

Desired Skills
Experience in ‘data’ – big data, analytics, data science, BI/DW, data integration
Early start-up experience

Role Description

It's fun to work in a company where people truly believe in what they're doing. At Health Hero, we're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business of enterprise health & wellness. We work hard, and we're serious about health & having fun.

You will manage, track, and report sales activities and results using PipeDrive

Uncapped commissions

USA / CANADA

Company Description
SaaS application software company that solves the most pressing problems of telecommuting, increases corporate efficiency and eliminates travel expenses.

If you have senior relationships IN ANY US / CANADA LOCATION with small to mid sized corporate accounts this is a great role to monetize your relationships into a significant income.

We are looking for experienced B2B sales professionals who can represent our client and land major corporate accounts.

Job Description
Seeking Independent Software Sales Professionals to sell a SaaS video conferencing Application which solves the most pressing problems of remote work, distributed teams/telecommuting, and increases corporate efficiency.

We are looking for an experienced B2B sales professional who can land corporate accounts.

If you have some strong contacts and desire high earnings this could be a great role.

You will have an opportunity to earn unlimited residual commission equaling roughly half of our profit margin. A single client with a thousand users will generate you about US$1,000 per month or more, indefinitely. Otherwise our service is great as an added value sale to other products.

Do you have a few minutes to discuss this incredible opportunity?

• Excellent written and verbal communication skills

B2B Sales experience
Hunter mentality

• Able to multi-task in a fast-paced environment
• Able to work independently using good business judgment

We provide you with the tools and global support! You do the business!

New York City, Remote · Full Time

Sales, Databases, Enterprise Software, Enterprise Sales
Compensation
$225K–$300K
0.0%–0.05%

Job Description

MemSQL is looking for an accomplished database sales rockstar to add to our growing team. He/She will be tasked with transforming named accounts into real-time enterprises within the Northeast region. MemSQL is more than doubling annual revenue year-after-year and our list of Fortune500 customers just keeps growing. We are looking for an accomplished high-tech sales evangelist and startup player who will showcase MemSQL’s market superiority and grow our strategic accounts customer list.

About the Position

The Enterprise/Strategic Account Executive will develop, manage, and close sales opportunities within a select number of strategic accounts within the Northeast region. You will have the opportunity to overachieve and earn uncapped commission and accelerators. You must meet or exceed territory sales targets using deep industry expertise, drive, creativity and your already formed relationships with C-level clients, buyers and stakeholders. You thrive in an environment that is fast-moving and highly collaborative.

Desired Skills and Experience
-Proven track record of successfully selling new enterprise solutions (large software, big data, and analytics solutions in particular) and increasing revenue through new customer acquisition.
-8+ years successful software sales experience
-Consistent track-record of surpassing sales targets.
-Strong understanding of how to grow a greenfield territory.
-Demonstrated ability to sell to CXO or line of business, successfully emphasizing business value vs. product.
-Actively listen to determine the customers’ needs.
-Operate in a fast-moving, entrepreneurial environment and do not require overhead support (You have no problems producing your own territory plan, presentations, quotes, etc.).
-Able to garner commitment at every step of sales process, a proven closer.

-Connecting with partnered fitness studios and conducting meetings regularly to maintain long-term relationships and address their concerns

-Working closely with the Product and Technology team to improve services basis feedback received

-Working closely with the Branding and Marketing team to increase customer engagement with the brand and with the product

-Developing strategies for the expansion of FITPASS pan India

Prerequisites:
-Bachelor's degree in any field
-0-2 years of work experience in a client facing role
-Excellent oral/written communication and negotiation skills
-Enthusiastic and self-motivated individuals with the drive to achieve targets
-Comfortable traveling within the city
-Excellent organizational and time management skills
-Sufficient knowledge of MS Office (Excel/Word)

items.title: Business Development Director
items.content:
Business Development Director at ROIKOI

Austin, Seattle, Remote · Full Time
Skills
Business Development, Sales, Startups, Prospecting and Cold Calling
Compensation
$75K–$125K
0.1%–0.25%
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

Job Description

You excel at using clever, personal touches to prospect into an executive-level audience (VP and up). You're eager to join a fast-paced start-up with a great sales leader and to grow into a closing role. You're smart, hungry, and humble and excited about a low base, high uncapped commission, and generous equity.

As a Business Development Director, you will be responsible for setting meetings with executives. You will be involved in conversations with all levels of an organization and must use professional communication, research findings, and interviewing tactics, along with marketing and sales savvy to generate interest and opportunity. Ideal candidates have a successful track record in an inside sales, outbound phone/email heavy, demand generation, and market development role at a SaaS company.

Responsibilities:

- Set appointments with executives in the assigned territories to deliver sales opportunities.
- Build lead lists including phone number and email address based on target company profiles.
- Conduct calling/emailing campaigns to uncover & qualify leads through personalized outbound efforts.
- Qualify leads from inbound marketing campaigns.
- Follow up and nurture contacts with varying levels of interest.
- Document all activity and conversations into Hubspot CRM.
- Demonstrate ROIKOI products to prospects.
- Maintain proper reports and provide activity updates.

You're smart, hungry, and humble and excited about a high uncapped commission ($125K OTE), and generous equity.

items.content:
Account Executive at Muck Rack

New York City, Remote · Full Time
Skills
SaaS, Sales, Public Relations, Enterprise Software, Enterprise Sales, SaaS Sales
Compensation
$40K–$50K
0.1%–0.5%
Visa Sponsorship
Not available

Job Description

SALARY RANGE DOES NOT INCLUDE BONUS POTENTIAL :)!

Muck Rack is looking for an ambitious individual who is looking to enter the world of sales at one of the fastest growing tech startups in NYC. Muck Rack's mission is to make journalists, PR pros and marketers more successful by providing the technology to do so. This includes helping media professionals find journalists to pitch and monitor on a day to day basis via Muck Rack Pro, our advanced service.

Muck Rack is looking for an Account Executive to take ownership over their footprint among Fortune 500 companies and large PR agencies across the world. This position will work closely with the Senior Vice President responsible for sales.

RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE:

-Generating leads via customized and strategic outreach
-Becoming involved in the public relations industry in New York and beyond
-Hitting sales goals and taking on new projects when needed
-Demoing Muck Rack at meetings, on phone calls and at events through creative demonstrations and presentations
-Tracking industry news to identify outreach opportunities

PREFERRED SKILLS AND INTERESTS:

-Knowledge of the PR and journalism industries
-1-3 years experience working in marketing, business development, PR, or sales
-Writing blog posts and marketing content
-Following and analyzing the news to assist with marketing and business promotion
-Dropbox, Trello, Google Apps, sales CRMs
-Email marketing
-Using social media and having a presence on popular platforms like Twitter, -Facebook, LinkedIn) to help with business promotion with outreach in the right way
-Sharing lots of animated GIFs
-Using the latest and greatest mobile and web apps
-Talking and meeting with lots of people all day to assist with marketing and business promotion

Job Description

We have a language learning product that's more than twice as effective as Rosetta Stone and our special architecture lets us quickly build out courses for specific professions like:

Spanish for medical workers
Spanish for law enforcement
Spanish for medical first response
Spanish for retail banking
Spanish for hospitality
Etc

We're looking for someone with experience selling into the HR training departments (or C Suits) of one or more of our target verticals.

You will need to be start-up minded. This will be our first sales position and you'll have a big role in forming and executing best practices in these areas. If you kick butt, we'll put together a larger team around you.

We are looking for this role to start out as largely commission based. As this will be a new B2B pipeline/process, initial commissions can be up to 50% of sales revenue.

Job Description

To apply for this post fill this form: https://appv4.talview.com/candidate/data/form?id=fe3

Who are we looking for?

We are looking for an energetic, disciplined and self-motivated individual to work with one of the fastest growing venture funded startups in Enterprise space ‘Talview’ as Inside Sales executive. The location will be Bangalore.

The ideal person must be energetic, ambitious, creative, performance-driven and one who believes that sky is the limit if they work hard. We offer a great compensation package: Fixed salary, monthly commissions, acceleration bonus, unlimited variable pay, awesome work culture and amazing growth.

The Sales Team is at the heart of Talview, forging into a newly emerging market with skill and a whole lot of strategy. The Sales team is focused on our clients' and prospects’ success with Digital Video Interviewing.
If you like it so far and intend to leave a mark in changing and making the world move closer to automation read on about some specifics about this role ->

Desired Skills -

• Experience in B2B selling in the International markets
• Proven ability to identify and develop new sales opportunities
• Knowledge of sales and marketing including selling principles and methods in order to promote solutions effectively
• The ideal candidate is entrepreneurial, creative, self-driven and highly analytical.
• Excellent verbal and written skills.
• Maintains a robust monthly sales pipeline
• Meets and exceeds monthly/ quarterly sales activities and revenue targets
• Listens carefully and effectively processes complex customer requirements on both a business and technical standpoints
• Communicate customers’ needs and issues to product management, marketing, and engineering teams

Mandatory Skills
• Minimum 1 Year in any form of international sales
• Willing to work in US Shift
• Passion for Technology & Sales
• Interacting with International customers


Location: HSR Layout, Bangalore

items.title: Sales Representative - Deltek, Inc. - Remote
items.content:
Sales Representative
Deltek, Inc. -Remote
Deltek is seeking an Account Executive to work on our dynamic mid-market team. As an Account Executive at Deltek, you will be responsible for all net new sales related activities within a defined US territory. Your focus will center on selling the Deltek suite of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) applications to the new business Marcom (Marketing & Communications) vertical. Your duties will include prospecting, pipeline building, opportunity development/management, presentation/demonstration, negotiation and closure of sales campaigns and opportunities with contacts at all levels including C level and VP level. Regular communication with management regarding the status of opportunities will be required.

A minimum of 5 years’ experience in Sales, Account Management, Inside Sales, Marketing or related field (ERP software sales and / or marketing agency experience a plus)
Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent combination of education and experience
Experience working with and leading clients through a strategic & defined sales processes
Advanced presentation skills, communicating value of the Deltek solution to all levels within a client organization.
Proven track record of over achievement against assigned quota. Excel at closing new business against brand name competitors, overcoming resistance to change and developing advisor based relationships.
Proven success selling high-value conceptual services to a creative environment. Excel at “hunting” new opportunities, finding opportunities and developing propensity for prospects to engage in a sales cycle.
Excellent prospecting, communication, negotiation and closing skills.
Demonstrated skills and training in professional sales methodology such as Solution Selling, Customer Centric Selling, Strategic Selling, SPIN Selling or other preferred.
Exceptional customer service skills and personable phone skills. Willingness to take ownership of any client need and potentially work outside of one's comfort area to find a solution.
Creativity in finding positive solutions to challenges as well as good written and verbal communication skills
Familiarity in selling SAAS and Cloud Offerings a plus
Be a self-starter and independent thinker with the aptitude to work autonomously
Willing and able to travel as needed (not frequent)
Ability to lead a collaborative sales effort engaging supporting personnel from other teams.
Experience and skilled usage with CRM, Power Point, Word, Excel and Outlook.
